Posts.EditableText: My computer died while I was working on a quest gamebook. Now, when I try to reopen the gamebook, it says "*Failed to load game due to the following errors: Invalid XML: Root element is missing." Is there a way for me to get back into my gamebook?
Posts.HTML: My computer died while I was working on a quest gamebook. Now, when I try to reopen the gamebook, it says "*Failed to load game due to the following errors: Invalid XML: Root element is missing." Is there a way for me to get back into my gamebook?

Posts.EditableText:
First, make a copy of the file, in case you mess up.

You will need to use a text editor to modify the file. I would suggest creating a new game and seeing what that looks like in the text editor first - especially the first few lines and the last one. Then replicate that in the damaged file. Then try to open the file up in a browser like Chrome, it will probably say if there are errors and point you to where in the file.

Then replicate that in the damaged file. Then try to open the file up in a browser like Chrome, it will probably say if there are errors and point you to where in the file.
